member.name: RGBQUAD
member.summary: The RGBQUAD structure describes a color consisting of relative intensities of red, green, and blue.

member.name: RGBQUAD.rgbBlue
member.summary: The intensity of blue in the color.

member.name: RGBQUAD.rgbGreen
member.summary: The intensity of green in the color.

member.name: RGBQUAD.rgbRed
member.summary: The intensity of red in the color.

member.name: RGBQUAD.rgbReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved and must be zero.
